overview: Claire is composed of digital scans and blow-ups of a series of three ink-on-paper artworks created in 2012 by French-Spanish researcher, publisher and artist Claire Latxague.  While collecting drawings, written documents and other printed materials for a (yet unreleased) project called Un film de papier, I’ve stumbled upon Latxague’s artwork, entitled À la renverse.  The blow-ups were made in an attempt of unearthing cartographic imagery in abstract compositions.
tagline: A black and white study on flickering.
title: Claire
